meanings.definition: To agree or consent to a request or demand.
meanings.sent1: She will accede to their proposal for a new playground.
meanings.sent2: I accede to your terms and conditions for the project.
meanings.sent3: After much persuasion, he finally decided to accede to their plan.
meanings.sent4: Her parents were hesitant at first but eventually acceded to her request for a pet.
meanings.sent5: The team captain had to accede to the coach's decision for the lineup.

meanings.definition: To attain a position or rank.
meanings.sent1: With hard work, he was able to accede to the position of manager.
meanings.sent2: She hopes to accede to a leadership role within the company.
meanings.sent3: The young actor's dream was to accede to the status of a Hollywood star.
meanings.sent4: Through dedication, she managed to accede to the top of the corporate ladder.
meanings.sent5: He aspired to accede to the rank of general in the army.

meanings.definition: To enter into a position or office.
meanings.sent1: The new president will accede to office next week.
meanings.sent2: He acceded to the role of CEO after the retirement of the previous one.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to accede to the position of ruler of the house.
meanings.sent4: The young prince was set to accede to the throne upon his father's abdication.
meanings.sent5: She was thrilled to accede to the prestigious position of head chef.
